live_updates: Technicians continue to await clearance to access the site and continue repairs. Further updates will be posted when they become available to us. Thank you for your continued patience.

Local Officials and Fortis BC have restricted access to the site due to ongoing wildfire activity. Shaw Technicians are awaiting for site clearance before further repairs can take place. We will provide updates as available. Thank you.
